  prototype={<>static MachineBasicBlock &#42; tryToSplitRestore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; DirtyPreds, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function splits the restore point and returns new restore point/BB.

DirtyPreds: Predessors of <code>MBB</code> that are ReachableByDirty

Decision has been made to split the restore point. old restore point: <code>MBB</code> new restore point: <code>NMBB</code> This function makes the necessary block layout changes so that
<ul>
<li><code>NMBB</code> points to <code>MBB</code> unconditionally</li>
<li>All dirtyPreds that previously pointed to <code>MBB</code> point to <code>NMBB</code></li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00479">479</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/shrinkwrap-cpp">ShrinkWrap.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateTerminator() {#a0d669f3a4d6e865cc9d89c43e230976f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void updateTerminator (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; BBToUpdate, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NMBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function updates the branches post restore point split.

Restore point has been split. Old restore point: MBB New restore point: NMBB <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> basic <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block(say BBToUpdate)</a> which had a fallthrough to MBB previously should
<ul>
<li>Fallthrough to NMBB iff NMBB is inserted immediately above MBB in the block layout OR</li>
<li>Branch unconditionally to NMBB iff NMBB is inserted at any other place.</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Class to determine where the safe point to insert the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// prologue and epilogue are.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Unlike the paper from Fred C. Chow, PLDI&#39;88, that introduces the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// shrink-wrapping term for prologue/epilogue placement, this pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// does not rely on expensive data-flow analysis. Instead we use the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// dominance properties and loop information to decide which point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are safe for such insertion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-shrinkwrap-cpp-/shrinkwrap"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-shrinkwrap-cpp-/shrinkwrap/#a17de0c0936c0f365ccbd2deb62e4ca6f">ShrinkWrap</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Hold callee-saved information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerclassinfo">RegisterClassInfo</a> RCI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &#42;MDT = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &#42;MPDT = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The epilogue will be inserted before the first terminator instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in this basic block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Restore = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Is &#96;true&#96; for the block numbers where we assume possible stack accesses</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or computation of stack-relative addresses on any CFG path including the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check if \\p Op is known to access an address not on the function&#39;s stack .</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// At the moment, accesses where the underlying object is a global, function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// argument, or jump table are considered non-stack accesses. Note that the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// caller&#39;s stack may get accessed when passing an argument via the stack,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == FrameDestroyOpcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">    LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Frame instruction: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; MI &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">    return true;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42;MF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = MF-&gt;getSubtarget().getRegisterInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    bool UseOrDefCSR = false;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    if (MO.isReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore instructions like DBG&#95;VALUE which don&#39;t read/def the register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (!MO.isDef() &amp;&amp; !MO.readsReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">        continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">      Register PhysReg = MO.getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (!PhysReg)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">        continue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">      assert(PhysReg.isPhysical() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unallocated register?!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The stack pointer is not normally described as a callee-saved register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in calling convention definitions, so we need to watch for it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// separately. An SP mentioned by a call instruction, we can ignore,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// though, as it&#39;s harmless and we do not want to effectively disable tail</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calls by forcing the restore point to post-dominate them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PPC&#39;s LR is also not normally described as a callee-saved register in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calling convention definitions, so we need to watch for it, too. An LR</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mentioned implicitly by a return (or &quot;branch to link register&quot;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction we can ignore, otherwise we may pessimize shrinkwrapping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseOrDefCSR =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">          (!MI.isCall() &amp;&amp; PhysReg == SP) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">          RCI.getLastCalleeSavedAlias(PhysReg) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">          (!MI.isReturn() &amp;&amp; TRI-&gt;isNonallocatableRegisterCalleeSave(PhysReg));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (MO.isRegMask()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if this regmask clobbers any of the CSRs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">      for (unsigned Reg : getCurrentCSRs(RS)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (MO.clobbersPhysReg(Reg)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">          UseOrDefCSR = true;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">          break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip FrameIndex operands in DBG&#95;VALUE instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseOrDefCSR || (MO.isFI() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isDebugValue())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Use or define CSR(&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; UseOrDefCSR &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;) or FI(&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; MO.isFI() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;): &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; MI &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      return true;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if there is a clean path from SavePoint to the original</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">    Restore = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MPDT-&gt;getNode(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block is not in the post dom tree, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// means the block never returns. If that&#39;s the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case, we don&#39;t want to call</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;findNearestCommonDominator&#96;, which will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">    Restore = MPDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Restore, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">    Restore = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Abort, we can&#39;t find a restore point in this case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we would be able to insert the restore code before the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Restore == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Terminator : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.terminators()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!useOrDefCSROrFI(Terminator, RS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;StackAddressUsed=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One of the terminator needs to happen before the restore point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.succ&#95;empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">        Restore = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Abort, we can&#39;t find a restore point in this case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for a restore point that post-dominates all the successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The immediate post-dominator is what we are looking for.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">      Restore = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;Restore, Restore-&gt;successors(), &#42;MPDT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Restore) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Restore point needs to be spanned on several blocks\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure Save and Restore are suitable for shrink-wrapping:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 all path from Save needs to lead to Restore before exiting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 all path to Restore needs to go through Save from Entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We achieve that by making sure that:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A. Save dominates Restore.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// B. Restore post-dominates Save.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C. Save and Restore are in the same loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SaveDominatesRestore = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RestorePostDominatesSave = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Restore &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">         (!(SaveDominatesRestore = MDT-&gt;dominates(Save, Restore)) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">          !(RestorePostDominatesSave = MPDT-&gt;dominates(Restore, Save)) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Post-dominance is not enough in loops to ensure that all uses/defs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are after the prologue and before the epilogue at runtime.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// E.g.,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// while(1) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Save</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Restore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (...)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     break;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  use/def CSRs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All the uses/defs of CSRs are dominated by Save and post-dominated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by Restore. However, the CSRs uses are still reachable after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Restore and before Save are executed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now, just push the restore/save points outside of loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Refine the criteria to still find interesting cases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">          MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Save) || MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fix (A).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SaveDominatesRestore) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">      Save = MDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Save, Restore);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fix (B).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RestorePostDominatesSave)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">      Restore = MPDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Restore, Save);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fix (C).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Restore &amp;&amp; (MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Save) || MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Save) &gt; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Restore)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Push Save outside of this loop if immediate dominator is different</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from save block. If immediate dominator is not different, bail out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">        Save = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;Save, Save-&gt;predecessors(), &#42;MDT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Save)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the loop does not exit, there is no point in looking</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for a post-dominator outside the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">        MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore)-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Push Restore outside of this loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for the immediate post-dominator of the loop exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;IPdom = Restore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopExitBB: ExitBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">          IPdom = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;IPdom, LoopExitBB-&gt;successors(), &#42;MPDT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IPdom)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the immediate post-dominator is not in a less nested loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then we are stuck in a program with an infinite loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In that case, we will not find a safe point, hence, bail out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IPdom &amp;&amp; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(IPdom) &lt; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Restore))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">          Restore = IPdom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">          Restore = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isEHPad() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isInlineAsmBrIndirectTarget()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// jump out via inlineasm&#95;br), by making sure that all the landing pads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StackAddressUsed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we found any stack accesses in the predecessors. We are not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// doing a full dataflow analysis here to keep things simple but just</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rely on a reverse portorder traversal (RPOT) to guarantee predecessors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are already processed except for loops (and accept the conservative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result for loops).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;predecessors()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StackAddressUsedBlockInfo.test(Pred-&gt;getNumber())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Save (resp. restore) point must dominate (resp. post dominate)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MI. Look for the proper basic block for those.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">        updateSaveRestorePoints(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, RS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are at a point where we cannot improve the placement of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ArePointsInteresting()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No need to look for other instructions, this basic block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will already be part of the handled region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Save &amp;&amp; !Restore &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;We miss a shrink-wrap opportunity?!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSaveCheap, TargetCanUseSaveAsPrologue = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
